sentences.en: All the larvae are straight, with a slight taper towards the rear.
sentences.cn: 所有幼虫都是直形背部略带锥形.

sentences.en: Clamp Arm: Taper mounted convenient arm adjustment, 360 degree adjustment.
sentences.cn: 夹臂: 锥形调整臂安装方便, 360度的调整.

sentences.en: Elsewhere the token of sin, it was the taper of the sick chamber.
sentences.cn: 那字母本来是罪恶的标记, 此时在病室中却成了一支烛光.

sentences.en: He glanced at his own white taper fingers, shuddering slightly in spite of himself.
sentences.cn: 他瞧瞧自己白而修长的手指, 不由自主地微微打了个寒噤.

sentences.en: If the charcoal does fail to light, use a special liquid spray and light it with a long taper.
sentences.cn: 要是木炭确实着不了的话，使用一种特殊的液体喷剂，再用长木片将其点燃。

sentences.en: Look at the computer. How many centimeters are there in your taper?
sentences.cn: 师:看电脑是怎样测量圆锥的高. 量一量自己的圆锥的高是多少厘米.

sentences.en: Place Taper - lock Bushing and Timing Belt Pulley on the transmission shaft.
sentences.cn: 将锥面紧固套与同步带轮装在传动轮上.
肺动脉向周围逐渐变细.

sentences.en: Shirley leaned forwards on the table, her taper fingers interlaced and compressing each other hard.
sentences.cn: 谢利欠身向前,靠着桌子, 尖细的手指交叉在一起,彼此钩得紧紧的.
拿着点燃的细蜡烛的小男孩

sentences.en: Taper the shape of your eyebrows towards the outer corners.
sentences.cn: 把你的眉毛修剪成越往外眼角越细的月牙形。

sentences.en: The presence of Miss Dale illuminated him as the burning taper lights up the consecrated plate.
sentences.cn: 戴尔小姐的在场象燃烧的细长蜡烛照亮了装贡品的碟子一样使他容光焕发.

sentences.en: The symmetry rolling technology for taper ring is suggested.
sentences.cn: 成功开发了圆锥套圈对称辗扩的新工艺.

sentences.en: Unlike other trees, it doesn't taper very much.
sentences.cn: 和别的树不同，它不是越往上越细。

sentences.en: Unlike other trees, it doesn't taper very much. It stays fat all the way up.
sentences.cn: 和别的树不同，它不是越往上越细，而是上下一样粗。

sentences.en: Without the misalignment, coupling efficiency increases with the decreasing of taper length.
sentences.cn: 失配不存在时, 耦合效率随著锥长的增加而减小.

words.tran_cn: 逐渐变少（taper的过去式和过去分词）
细蜡烛，烛芯；逐渐变弱；锥形物

trans.tran_en: If something tapers, or if you taper it, it becomes gradually thinner at one end

trans.tran_cn: 逐渐变细，变尖，逐渐减弱
